title: Follow Your Heart Restaurant and Market
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Long time operating veggie restaurant and all vegetarian natural foods market by the same name. Restaurant serves vegan and vegetarian breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Eat at the counter, at tables inside, or out on the front patio. Busy on weekends. The market offers a wide selection of natural foods products, snacks, supplements, books, gifts, health and personal care products. Parking provided.
